mapper.select: SELECT cms.ms_idx, cms.ms_start_date, cms.ms_end_date, cms.ms_admin_id, cms.ms_reason, cms.mb_id, cm.mb_nickname , cm.mb_name, (select count(ms_idx) +1 from cp_member_stop where mb_id = cms.mb_id and ms_idx <cms.ms_idx) as ms_count FROM cp_member_stop cms JOIN cp_member cm ON cm.mb_id = cms.mb_id ORDER BY cms.ms_end_date DESC

SELECT cms.ms_idx, cms.ms_start_date, cms.ms_end_date, cms.ms_admin_id, cms.ms_reason, cms.mb_id, cm.mb_nickname , cm.mb_name, (select count(ms_idx) +1 from cp_member_stop where mb_id = cms.mb_id and ms_idx <cms.ms_idx) as ms_count FROM cp_member_stop cms JOIN cp_member cm ON cm.mb_id = cms.mb_id WHERE cms.mb_id = #{param1} ORDER BY cms.ms_end_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_member_stop SET ms_start_date = ( case when (SELECT COUNT(ms_idx) FROM cp_member_stop ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id}) >= 1 then DATE_ADD((select ms_end_date from cp_member_stop ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where mb_id = #{mb_id} order by ms_end_date desc limit 1), INTERVAL 1 DAY) else now() end ), ms_end_date = ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(ms_idx) FROM cp_member_stop ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id}) = 0 THEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) WHEN (SELECT COUNT(ms_idx) FROM cp_member_stop ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id}) = 1 THEN DATE_ADD((select ms_end_date from cp_member_stop ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where mb_id = #{mb_id} order by ms_end_date desc limit 1) , INTERVAL 7 DAY) ELSE '9999-12-31' END ), ms_admin_id = #{ms_admin}, ms_reason = #{ms_reason}, mb_id = #{mb_id}
